items.content_html: Toast JS is a lightweight and customizable JavaScript library for creating toast notifications. It's designed to be easy to use and flexible, allowing developers to create notifications that fit their web application's design and functionality.
items.title: SoufianoDev/Toast-JS: Toast JS is a lightweight and customizable JavaScript library for creating toast notifications. It's designed to be easy to use and flexible, allowing developers to create notifications that fit their web application's design and functionality.

items.content_html: A lightweight Database GUI in your browser. It supports connecting to Postgres, MySQL, and SQLite.
items.title: outerbase/studio: A lightweight Database GUI in your browser. It supports connecting to Postgres, MySQL, and SQLite.

items.content_html: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.
items.title: react18-tools/react-webgl-trails: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.

items.content_html: Clocs is a simple, lightweight, and easy to use world clock application that can be used to easily display time and friends in different time zones.
items.title: asboy2035/Clocs: Clocs is a simple, lightweight, and easy to use world clock application that can be used to easily display time and friends in different time zones.

items.content_html: Lillihub is a simple, lightweight micro.blog web client with a light/dark mode and responsive design. It is built using Deno, HTML, CSS, and a sprinkle of vanilla JavaScript. It is delightfully usable without JavaScript being enabled.
items.title: heyloura/lillihub-client: Lillihub is a simple, lightweight micro.blog web client with a light/dark mode and responsive design. It is built using Deno, HTML, CSS, and a sprinkle of vanilla JavaScript. It is delightfully usable without JavaScript being enabled.

items.content_html: Lightweight and flexible UI component library based on web components technology for creating basic UX modules
items.title: exadel-inc/esl: Lightweight and flexible UI component library based on web components technology for creating basic UX modules

items.content_html: A lightweight library for managing dark mode, accommodating both user preferences and the system preference.
items.title: react18-tools/nextjs-darkmode: A lightweight library for managing dark mode, accommodating both user preferences and the system preference.

items.content_html: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.
items.title: react18-tools/react-markdown-autolink: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.

items.content_html: EsImageUpload is a lightweight and flexible image upload solution for Next.js projects. It simplifies the process of handling image uploads, storage, and retrieval, with support for both local and cloud storage.
items.title: mdshamim07/esImageUpload: EsImageUpload is a lightweight and flexible image upload solution for Next.js projects. It simplifies the process of handling image uploads, storage, and retrieval, with support for both local and cloud storage.

items.content_html: Gland is a lightweight framework for Node.js designed for simplicity
items.title: medishen/gland: Gland is a lightweight framework for Node.js designed for simplicity

items.content_html: Lumi UI is a lightweight, customizable, and developer-friendly UI component library.
items.title: lumi-work/lumi.ui: Lumi UI is a lightweight, customizable, and developer-friendly UI component library.

items.content_html: NanoService is an open-source framework that enables developers to build lightweight, modular, and scalable backend applications using nanoservices.
items.title: deskree-inc/nanoservice-ts: NanoService is an open-source framework that enables developers to build lightweight, modular, and scalable backend applications using nanoservices.

items.title: KodekoStudios/Kodkord: Kodkord is a robust and lightweight, low dependency and high performance library for interacting with the Discord API.

items.content_html: A lightweight library for building fast, reactive web components.
items.title: 0-v-0/cydon: A lightweight library for building fast, reactive web components.

items.content_html: queFork is a simple, lightweight web API testing platform. Supports REST HTTP requests and real-time websockets protocols.
items.title: somritdasgupta/queFork: queFork is a simple, lightweight web API testing platform. Supports REST HTTP requests and real-time websockets protocols.

items.content_html: lightweight version of desktop color cache version
items.title: AlexisGood100/colorCacheMobile: lightweight version of desktop color cache version

items.content_html: MUI Stepper Pro is a fully customizable and lightweight stepper component built for React and Material-UI. Designed for flexibility and ease of use, it supports dynamic steps, validations, and smooth transitions. Whether you're building multi-step forms or interactive wizards, this open-source stepper makes navigation seamless.
items.title: Neeraj000Monga/Custom_Stepper: MUI Stepper Pro is a fully customizable and lightweight stepper component built for React and Material-UI. Designed for flexibility and ease of use, it supports dynamic steps, validations, and smooth transitions. Whether you're building multi-step forms or interactive wizards, this open-source stepper makes navigation seamless.
